mapper.sql: a.id as id, a.name as "name", a.code as code, a.remark as "remark", a.sort as sort, a.del_flag as delFlag, a.create_by as createBy, a.create_time as createTime, a.update_by as updateBy, a.update_time as updateTime
mapper.select:
select
from sys_module a
and a.name like CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
and a.code like CONCAT('%', #{code}, '%')
order by ${orderBy}
order by a.sort asc
